attrs.script:
sudo -i git -C @@{appname}@@ remote update
sudo -i git -C @@{appname}@@ status -uno | grep -q 'up-to-date' || new_commits=1
if [ $new_commits -eq 1 ]
then
  echo found new commits in @@{apprepo}@@
  sudo -i appscale deploy @@{appname}@@
else
  echo no new commits in @@{apprepo}@@
fi

echo waiting for network to initialize
sleep 60
echo installing the application
sudo -i git clone @@{apprepo}@@
sudo -i sh -c 'echo "application: @@{appname}@@" >>@@{appname}@@/app.yaml'
sudo -i appscale deploy @@{appname}@@

echo waiting for network to initialize
sleep 60
echo installing the application
sudo -i git clone @@{apprepo}@@
sudo -i sh -c 'echo "application: @@{appname}@@" >>@@{appname}@@/app.yaml'
sudo -i appscale deploy @@{appname}@@

echo waiting for network to initialize
sleep 60
echo installing the application
sudo -i git clone @@{apprepo}@@
sudo -i sh -c 'echo "application: @@{appname}@@" >>@@{appname}@@/app.yaml'
sudo -i appscale deploy @@{appname}@@

echo waiting for network to initialize
sleep 60
echo installing the application
sudo -i git clone @@{apprepo}@@
sudo -i sh -c 'echo "application: @@{appname}@@" >>@@{appname}@@/app.yaml'
sudo -i appscale deploy @@{appname}@@

sudo -i git -C @@{appname}@@ remote update
sudo -i git -C @@{appname}@@ status -uno | grep -q 'up-to-date' || new_commits=1
if [ $new_commits -eq 1 ]
then
  echo found new commits in @@{apprepo}@@
  sudo -i appscale deploy @@{appname}@@
else
  echo no new commits in @@{apprepo}@@
fi
